ygData.subject: Re: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I really hate people who do that.  It seems half the time we re trying to break into the courtyard or have set up in the courtyard and are preparing to
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 13 Oct 1999, Dan Morris wrote:
>
> Dunno your level or type of group you play with, but you are in error (not a
> direct personal attack, maybe just misinformed). A friend of mine (Druid 50)
> and myself (Warrior 45) are able to clear out the Princess, Butler, Maid,
> Vampire, and gypsy (late, cant think of the exact names) spots in about 15
> mins. Only had to evac once and that was due to someone having a look see,
> and not conning the will sappers who see through invis. Pulled quite an
> impressive train, and hope he could appreciate how big it was. Maybe take
> some comfort his death impressed others =)

I really hate people who do that. It seems half the time
we're trying to break into the courtyard or have set up in the
courtyard and are preparing to work into the castle, some
idiot has to go take a looksie, usually while we're fighting,
and ends up dumping half the castle on us.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
